{"id":923095120,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1679931926,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"25 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/923095120/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        if(s.length()==0)return 0;   \n        unordered_map<char,int> m;   \n        int i=0,j=0,ans=INT_MIN; \n        while(j<s.length())   \n        {\n            m[s[j]]++;  \n            if(m.size()==j-i+1)  \n            {\n                ans = max(ans,j-i+1);  \n            }\n            else if(m.size()<j-i+1)   \n            {\n                while(m.size()<j-i+1)  \n                {\n                    m[s[i]]--;   \n                    if(m[s[i]]==0)\n                    {\n                        m.erase(s[i]);\n                    }\n                    i++;   \n                }\n            }\n             j++;  \n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
